Package org.apache.lenya.cms.repo

Interface Summary
Area An area.
Asset Content node.
AssetType  
AssetTypeResolver A class implementing this interface can be used by the repository for resolving asset types.
Content The content of an area.
Publication A publication.
Repository Repository.
RepositoryFactory Factory for repositories.
Session Repository session.
Site The site structure of an area.
SiteNode A site node, which represents a site (subsite) itself.
Translation Document.
 

Class Summary
RepositoryManager Repository manager.
 

Exception Summary
RepositoryException Repository exception.
